snippet: A series on YouTube, produced by the director of “The Usual Suspects” and “X-Men,” tells of a near future in which humans are nearly wiped out by chips installed in their bodies.
abstract: A series on YouTube, produced by the director of “The Usual Suspects” and “X-Men,” tells of a near future in which humans are nearly wiped out by chips installed in their bodies.

headline.main: Future Shock: Bryan Singer Discusses His New Web Series, 'H+'
headline.print_headline: Film Director Taking Online Series to YouTube
